actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage.
actions.name: Scimitar (Yuan-ti Form Only)

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Spectral Fangs

actions.description:
The yuan-ti taps into the nightmares of one creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates an illusory, immobile manifestation of the creature's deepest fears, visible only to that creature.

The target must make a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) psychic damage and is frightened of the manifestation, believing it to be real. The yuan-ti must concentrate to maintain the illusion (as if concentrating on a spell), which lasts for up to 1 minute and can't be harmed. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the illusion on a success or taking 11 (2d10) psychic damage on a failure.
actions.name: Invoke Nightmare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At will: animal friendship (snakes only), mage hand, message, prestidigitation

3/day each: suggestion

2/day each: darkness, fear
actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the yuan-ti's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

actions.description: The yuan-ti makes three Bite attacks or two Spectral Fangs attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) poison damage.
actions.name: Spectral Fangs

actions.description: The yuan-ti targets up to five creatures that it can see within 60 feet of it. Each target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or fall into a magical sleep and be unconscious for 10 minutes. A sleeping target awakens if it takes damage or if someone uses an action to shake or slap it awake. This magical sleep has no effect on a creature immune to being charmed.
actions.name: Merrshaulk's Slumber (1/Day)

actions.description:
The yuan-ti casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At will: animal friendship (snakes only), guidance, mage hand, message

3/day each: suggestion

2/day each: hold person, invisibility
actions.name: Spellcasting (Yuan-ti Form Only)

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede the yuan-ti's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

actions.description: The zaratan makes one Bite attack and one Stomp attack.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 28 (4d8 + 10) force damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 17 to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. Hit: 26 (3d10 + 10) thunder damage.
actions.name: Stomp

actions.description: 17 to hit, range 120 ft./240 ft., one target. Hit: 31 (6d8 + 10) force damage.
actions.name: Spit Rock

actions.description: The zaratan exhales rocky debris in a 90-foot cube. Each creature in that area must make a DC 25 Dexterity saving throw. A creature takes 33 (6d10) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails the save by 5 or more is knocked prone.
actions.name: Spew Debris (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: The zaratan makes one Stomp attack.
actions.name: Stomp

actions.description: The zaratan moves up to its speed.
actions.name: Move

actions.description: The zaratan makes one Spit Rock attack.
actions.name: Spit (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The zaratan retracts into its shell. Until it takes its Emerge action, it has resistance to all damage, and it is restrained. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Revitalize or Emerge action.
actions.name: Retract (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The zaratan can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell. It regains 52 (5d20) hit points. The next time it takes a legendary action, it must take its Emerge action.
actions.name: Revitalize (Costs 2 Actions)

actions.description: The zaratan emerges from its shell and makes one Spit Rock attack. It can use this option only if it is retracted in its shell.
actions.name: Emerge (Costs 2 Actions)

zaratan_[mom].name: Zaratan [MoM]
zaratan_[mom].resistances: cold, fire, lightning; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks

specialTraits.description: If the zaratan fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures (included in Earth-Shaking Movement).
specialTraits.name: Siege Monster

actions.description: Zariel makes three Flail or Longsword attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Horrid Touch, if available.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) force damage plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.
actions.name: Flail

actions.description: 16 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 17 (2d8 + 8) radiant damage, or 19 (2d10 + 8) radiant damage when used with two hands, plus 36 (8d8) fire damage.
actions.name: Longsword

actions.description: Zariel touches one creature within 10 feet of her. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Constitution saving throw or take 44 (8d10) necrotic damage and be poisoned for 1 minute. While poisoned in this way, the target is blinded and deafened. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
actions.name: Horrid Touch (Recharge 5-6)

actions.description: Zariel teleports, along with any equipment she is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description:
Zariel casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 26):
At will: alter self (can become Medium when changing her appearance), detect evil and good, fireball, invisibility (self only), major image, wall of fire

3/day each: blade barrier, dispel evil and good, finger of death
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Zariel uses Teleport.
actions.name: Teleport

actions.description: Zariel turns her magical gaze toward one creature she can see within 120 feet of her and commands it to burn. The target must succeed on a DC 26 Wisdom saving throw or take 22 (4d10) fire damage.
actions.name: Immolating Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)

zariel_[mom].name: Zariel [MoM]
zariel_[mom].resistances: cold, fire, radiant; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't silvered

specialTraits.description: Magical darkness doesn't impede Zariel's darkvision.
specialTraits.name: Devil's Sight

specialTraits.description: If Zariel fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Zariel has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance

specialTraits.description: Zariel regains 20 hit points at the start of her turn. If she takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of her next turn. Zariel dies only if she starts her turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.
specialTraits.name: Regeneration

actions.description: The adept makes three unarmed strikes or three dart attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description:
5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, the adept can choose one of the following additional effects:

The target must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or drop one item it is holding (adept's choice).
The target must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be knocked prone.
The target must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the adept's next turn.
actions.name: Unarmed Strike

actions.description: 5 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
actions.name: Dart

specialTraits.description: The adept can move through the space of a medium of larger creature.
specialTraits.name: Halfling Nimbleness

specialTraits.description: The adept has advantage on any saving throws against being frightened.
specialTraits.name: Brave

specialTraits.description: While the adept is wearing no armor and wielding no shield, their AC includes their Wisdom modifier.
specialTraits.name: Unarmored Defense

actions.description: The zodar makes two Crushing Fist attacks. Before or after these attacks, the zodar uses Forced Teleport.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 15 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 21 (2d10 + 10) force damage.
actions.name: Crushing Fist

actions.description: The zodar magically warps space around one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target must make a DC 21 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 (4d10) force damage, and the zodar teleports it, along with any equipment it's wearing or carrying, up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space that the zodar can see and that can support the target. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't teleported.
actions.name: Forced Teleport

actions.description: The zodar casts the wish spell, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17). After casting this spell, the zodar turns to dust and is destroyed.
actions.name: Wish

zodar_[bam].conditionImmunities: blinded, charmed, deafened, exhaustion, frightened, petrified, poisoned
zodar_[bam].name: Zodar [BAM]

specialTraits.description: Up to three times in its life, the zodar can cause a message of up to twenty-five words to issue from the air around it. It speaks only when it has something profoundly important to say, and the message can be understood by any creature that has an Intelligence score of 2 or higher.
specialTraits.name: Disembodied Voice

specialTraits.description: If the zodar fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: The zodar can't be teleported or sent to any plane of existence against its will.
specialTraits.name: Transport Inhibitor

specialTraits.description: The zodar doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature

actions.description: The zombie makes two Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 18 (3d8 + 5) bludgeoning damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description:
The zombie flings a detached clump of corpses at a creature it can see within 30 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 16 Strength saving throw or take 16 (3d10) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, it becomes entombed in dead flesh.

A creature entombed in the dead flesh is restrained, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the dead flesh, and takes 10 (3d6) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The creature can be freed if the dead flesh is destroyed. The dead flesh is a Large object with AC 10, 25 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.
actions.name: Flesh Entomb (Recharge 5-6)

zombie_clot.conditionImmunities: charmed, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned, stunned
zombie_clot.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
zombie_clot.name: Zombie Clot

specialTraits.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the zombie must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or take 9 (2d8) poison damage and be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn.
specialTraits.name: Deathly Stench

specialTraits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
specialTraits.name: Undead Fortitude

specialTraits.description: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature

actions.description: The plague spreader makes two Slam attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 9 (2d8) necrotic damage.
actions.name: Slam

actions.description: The plague spreader releases toxic gas in a 30-foot-radius sphere centered on itself. Each creature in that area must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A Humanoid reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and rises as a zombie (see its stat block in the bestiary) 1 minute later. The zombie acts immediately after the plague spreader in the initiative count.
actions.name: Virulent Miasma (1/Day)

zombie_plague_spreader.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak
zombie_plague_spreader.name: Zombie Plague Spreader

specialTraits.description: If damage reduces the zombie to 0 hit points, it must make a Constitution saving throw with a DC of 5 + the damage taken, unless the damage is radiant or from a critical hit. On a success, the zombie drops to 1 hit point instead.
specialTraits.name: Undead Fortitude

specialTraits.description: The zombie doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature

specialTraits.description: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the plague spreader must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is poisoned and can't regain hit points until the end of its next turn. On a successful save, the creature is immune to this plague spreader's Viral Aura for 24 hours.
specialTraits.name: Viral Aura

actions.description: Zuggtmoy makes three Pseudopod attacks.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d8 + 6) force damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.
actions.name: Pseudopod

actions.description:
Zuggtmoy casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 22):
At will: detect magic, locate animals or plants

3/day each: dispel magic, entangle, plant growth

1/day each: etherealness, teleport
actions.name: Spellcasting

actions.description: Zuggtmoy makes one Pseudopod attack.
actions.name: Attack

actions.description: One creature charmed by Zuggtmoy that she can see must use its reaction, if a available, to move up to its speed as she directs or to make one weapon attack against a target that she designates.
actions.name: Exert Will

zuggtmoy_[mom].damageImmunities: poison; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing that is nonmagical
zuggtmoy_[mom].name: Zuggtmoy [MoM]

specialTraits.description: If Zuggtmoy fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead.
specialTraits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

specialTraits.description: Zuggtmoy has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
specialTraits.name: Magic Resistance
